generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with a cobblestone texture, which is characteristic of a road, and it extends across the entire foreground and midground.
- sidewalk: A paved area with a curb is visible on the right side of the image, separating it from the road, and people are walking on it, indicating it is a sidewalk.
- building: A large, light-colored building with windows and a door is prominently featured in the background.
- fence: A metal fence is visible in the background, running along the edge of the trees.
- pole: A thin pole is visible near the entrance of the building.
- vegetation: There are numerous trees and bushes visible in the background, especially on the left side of the image.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and the building.
- person: Several people are visible in the image, including one standing on the left side and others walking on the sidewalk on the right side.
- car: A car is visible parked on the right side of the image, near the sidewalk.
